body_html:
During training mode of an Estimator the summaries are added automatically (no need to use hooks). Why isn't it the same behavior for evaluation mode?

Related StackOverflow question: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46852018/tensorflow-estimator-api-save-image-summary-in-eval-mode
body_text:
During training mode of an Estimator the summaries are added automatically (no need to use hooks). Why isn't it the same behavior for evaluation mode?
Related StackOverflow question: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46852018/tensorflow-estimator-api-save-image-summary-in-eval-mode
body:
During training mode of an Estimator the summaries are added automatically (no need to use hooks). Why isn't it the same behavior for evaluation mode?

Related StackOverflow question: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46852018/tensorflow-estimator-api-save-image-summary-in-eval-mode
